DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify salivary biomarkers monitor cardiometabolic risk child . The study hypothesis combination salivary biomarkers predict presence risk factor include impaired fasting glucose , hypertension dyslipidemia reflect change risk factor time .
DOC.brief_title: Noninvasive Biomarkers Monitoring Cardiometabolic Risk Children
DOC.criteria: Participating CARDIAC Boot Camp Program Between age 4 17 Parental permission Ability provide assent Inability comply saliva collection procedures Renal insufficiency juvenile gout
